sense.def:
A term
je beseda ali nekaj besed skupaj, ki se uporabljajo za določen predmet ali pojem.

seg.quote: He asked them what they understood by the term ‘radical’.

sense.def:
To term
pomeni povedati, kakšno ime uporabljamo za določen pojem ali predmet.

seg.quote: ...recent breakthroughs in what might be termed ‘birth technology’.

sense.def:
A term
je eno izmed obdobij, na katera je po šolskem ali študijskem koledarju razdeljeno vsako leto.

seg.quote: It was the first week of term.

sense.def:
A term
je obdobje, v katerem nekdo opravlja določeno delo ali dejavnost.

seg.quote: ...Baldwin's second term of office as Premier.

sense.def:
The terms of an agreement or arrangement
so pogoji, ki so jih udeleženci v pogodbi sprejeli.

seg.quote: We will not accept these terms.

sense.def:
Kadar o nečem govorimo
in particular terms
ali
in terms of a particular thing
, opredelimo, o katerih vidikih tistega govorimo.

seg.quote: Life is going to be a little easier in economic terms.
In Marxist terms, nationalism of this kind cannot last.
These losses are not to be explained in terms of what happened last week.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is thinking in terms of doing something
ali
is talking in terms of doing something
, razmišlja ali govori o možnosti, da bi nekaj naredil.

cit.quote: razmišljati s stališča; razmišljati o tem, da bi

seg.quote: You should be thinking in terms of paying off your debts.

sense.def:
Izraza
the long term
in
the short term
uporabljamo, kadar govorimo o tem, kaj se bo zgodilo čez veliko časa ali v kratkem.

seg.quote: Such a policy would be economically disastrous in the long term.

sense.def:
To come to terms with something difficult or unpleasant
pomeni naučiti se sprejeti nekaj težavnega ali neprijetnega.

seg.quote: He has come to terms with death.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo z dvema človekoma ravna
on the same terms
ali
on equal terms
, ju obravnava enako.

Kadar sta dva človeka
on good terms
ali
on friendly terms
, se drug do drugega vedeta prijazno.

seg.quote: You need to be on friendly terms with him.
